effect.name: Plants VS Zombies Adventures Flower Cooldown (Texture)
effect.description:
The shader emits the cooldown effect of flowers from the game Plants VS Zombies Adventure, dividing the texture into two parts so that the gray level and brightness of each part can be changed separately.
Last Updated: 2026-01-04 22:02
effect.author: Foxioo (Made for speedinggames44)

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Plants VS Zombies Adventures Flower Cooldown (Texture) Shader | 1.0 (24.11.2025) */
parameter.description: The shader emits the cooldown effect of flowers from the game Plants VS Zombies Adventure, dividing the texture into two parts so that the gray level and brightness of each part can be changed separately..

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Time
parameter.description: The variable defines the cooldown time (from 0 to 1), i.e., it defines where on the Y axis the intersection into two halves should be.

parameter.name: In Gray Scale
parameter.description: This variable determines the gray level of the lower part (from 0 to 1).

parameter.name: In Multiplicaton
parameter.description: This variable determines the color multiplication level of the lower part.

parameter.name: Out Gray Scale
parameter.description: This variable determines the gray level of the upper part (from 0 to 1).

parameter.name: Out Multiplicaton
parameter.description: This variable determines the color multiplication level of the upper part.
